text: Hampden is a locality in the Mackay Region, Queensland, Australia. == History == Hampden State School opened on 9 May 1887. It caters for students from Prep to Year 6. A postal receiving office opened at Hampden on 21 August 1884, became a post office in August 1904 and closed on 14 October 1924. == Amenities == The Mackay Regional Council operates a mobile library service on a fortnightly schedule at the Bruce Highway near the school. ==References== Category:Mackay Region Category:Localities in Queensland
title: Hampden, Queensland
